member.name: MIBICMPSTATS_EX
member.summary: TheMIBICMPSTATS_EX structure contains extended statistics for either incoming or outgoing Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) messages on a particular computer.

member.name: MIBICMPSTATS_EX.dwMsgs
member.summary: Specifies the number of messages received or sent.

member.name: MIBICMPSTATS_EX.dwErrors
member.summary: The number of errors received or sent.
